alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Elk; McKean; Potter (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 8:18AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MCKEAN...POTTER...CAMERON...AND ELK COUNTIES THROUGH 945 AM... HAZARDS...A snow squall which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 815 AM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 17 miles northwest of Wellsville to 10 miles southwest of Bradford to 12 miles northeast of Oil City to near Grove City and moving east at 65 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Westline around 820 AM EST. Cyclone around 825 AM EST. Rew around 830 AM EST. Coryville and Smethport around 835 AM EST. Port Allegany around 840 AM EST. Shinglehouse around 845 AM EST. * This includes the following highways... Route 6 from east of Ludlow to Galeton. Route 219 from Brockport to near the Bradford Regional Airport. State Road 46 from Smethport to Farmers Valley. State Road 59 from the Bradford Regional Airport to Smethport. State Road 66 from Russell City to Kane. State Road 120 from Ridgway to east of Driftwood. State Road 255 from north of Penfield to Johnsonburg. State Road 446 from Farmers Valley to the New York border. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
